channel.title: Blog on Noha Writes
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Noha Writes

item.title: Harvard CS50’s Introduction to Cybersecurity Made My Classes Easy
item.description: Sometimes, one online course can be all it takes to break into a field. And in my story, it was the Harvard CS50’s introduction to cybersecurity! Here is a detailed course review

item.title: Windows vs. Linux, A Simple Guide That Finally Makes Sense
item.description: Confused about Windows vs Linux? This beginner-friendly guide explains key differences, use cases, and insights from a systems and network administrator.

item.title: Want to Break Into Tech? Start With a Hackathon
item.description: Ever heard of hackathons but never dared to try? Same, until I wrote this. Discover how hackathons go beyond coding, helping you build skills, confidence, and a stronger tech presence.

item.title: How to Learn Programming Faster: A DevOps Engineer’s Approach
item.description: Most programming learners struggle to make real progress. Let’s see how to master programming faster with practical advice from an experienced DevOps engineer.

item.title: How To break into Cybersecurity: Advice From A Learner
item.description: Cybersecurity is now essential across all fields. If you’re new and unsure where to start, this piece shares a learner’s journey and advice to guide you fast.
